    UIItem.SizeFlags
    Flags for a parent container to handle the position/size for child ui items UIItem.setHorizontalExpand() and respective unset UIItem.setHorizontalFill() and respective unset UIItem.setSizeFlagHorizontal(SizeFlags, boolean) ... also available for 'Vertical' instead of 'Horizontal'
